pageProduct.name: Protein World Vegan Slender Blend Chocolate Sachet 40g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

High in protein, packing a huge 26g with less than 0.5g of sugar and fat per serving. This is the perfect, natural shake

Common Uses

Use as a meal replacement twice per day in the context of an energy restricted diet, the Slender Blend contributes to weight loss

Ingredients

Protein World Vegan Protein Blend (Pea Protein, Quinoa Protein, Hemp Protein), Cocoa Powder, Xylitol, Inulin, Natural flavourings, Protein World Vitamin & Mineral Blend (magnesium oxide, potassium chloride, ascorbic acid, mixed natural tocopherols, zinc gluconate, ferrous fumarate, vitamin K2-menaquinone, molybdenum chelate, manganese gluconate, beta carotene, cupric gluconate, nicotinamide, calcium d-pantothenate, pyridoxine hydro-chloride, thiamin hydrochloride, riboflavin, cholecalciferol, methylcobalamin, chromium picolinate, folic acid, potassium iodide, sodium selenite, d-biotin), Salt, Steviol glycosides (sweetener), Xanthan Gum (thickener), Protein World Thermogenic Blend [Guarana Extract (22% caffeine) & Green Tea Extract (40% polyphenols)], Protein World Friendly Bacteria Blend (Bifidobacterium Bifidum, Lactobacillus Acidophillus)

Directions

As a Meal Replacement - Add 40g to 400ml of almond milk or other nut based milks (Coconut, Almond & Hazelnut). As a Post Workout shake - Add 40g to 400ml of water after exercise. Consume the Slender Blend twice a day as a meal replacement shake for optimum weight loss results
